DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : LILLEHAMMER ; LET THE GAMES BEGIN
DOC.TEXT: The Winter Olympic Games begin Saturday in this Norwegian sports resort . The Lillehammer Games start a new sequence in the Olympic schedule.Previously both the Winter and Summer Olympics were held_in the same year . The last Winter Games took_place in 1992 at Albertville , France , and the 1994 resumption begins a cycle in which each even-numbered year will see either a winter or summer festival . The 1996 Summer Games will take_place in Atlanta , and Calgary will host the 1998 Winter festival . These Games have been marked by controversy even before the opening ceremony , notably the drama involving the American women figure skaters . But as the XVIIth Games approach , Lillehammer appeared to be taking a fun-filled approach to the festival , anticipating the arrival of 100 # 000 tourists a day with bulging wallets .
